Detect Golden Cross

Source: R/trend.R
detect_golden_cross.Rd

Detect when a shorter moving average crosses above a longer moving average, which is a bullish signal.

Usage

detect_golden_cross(short_ma, long_ma)

Arguments

short_ma

Numeric vector: shorter moving average

long_ma

Numeric vector: longer moving average

Value

Logical vector: TRUE where golden cross occurs

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
library(tradeio)
library(dplyr)

prices <- fetch_prices("AAPL", from = "2024-01-01") |>
  add_sma(50, name = "sma_50") |>
  add_sma(200, name = "sma_200") |>
  mutate(golden_cross = detect_golden_cross(sma_50, sma_200))
} # }
